verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe,<s%> O <S%H740>Ariel,<s%> <S%H740>Ariel<s%> the <S%H7151>city<s%> [where] <S%H1732>David<s%> [once] <S%H2583>camped!<s%> <S%H3254>Add<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> to <S%H8141>year,<s%> <S%H5362>observe<s%> [your] <S%H2282>feasts<s%> on <S%H5362>schedule.<s%>

And I will <S%H6693>bring<s%> <S%H6693>distress<s%> to <S%H740>Ariel,<s%> And she shall be [a city of] <S%H8386>lamenting<s%> and <S%H592>mourning;<s%> And she shall be like an <S%H740>Ariel<s%> to me.

And I will <S%H2583>camp<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you <S%H1754>encircling<s%> [you,] And I will <S%H6696>set<s%> <S%H4674>siegeworks<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, And I will <S%H6965>raise<s%> up <S%H4694>battle<s%> <S%H4694>towers<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you.

Then you shall be <S%H8213>brought<s%> <S%H8213>low;<s%> From the <S%H776>earth<s%> you shall <S%H1696>speak,<s%> And from the <S%H6083>dust<s%> [where] you are <S%H7817>prostrate,<s%> Your <S%H565>words<s%> [shall come.] Your <S%H6963>voice<s%> shall also be like that of a <S%H178>spirit<s%> from the <S%H776>ground,<s%> And your <S%H565>speech<s%> shall <S%H6850>whisper<s%> from the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>

But the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of your <S%H2114>enemies<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> like <S%H1851>fine<s%> <S%H80>dust,<s%> And the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of the <S%H6184>ruthless<s%> <S%H6184>ones<s%> like the <S%H4671>chaff<s%> which <S%H5674>blows<s%> <S%H5674>away;<s%> And it shall <S%H1961>happen<s%> <S%H6621>instantly,<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly.<s%>

From the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> you will be <S%H6485>punished<s%> with <S%H7482>thunder<s%> and <S%H7494>earthquake<s%> and <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>noise,<s%> [With] <S%H5492>whirlwind<s%> and <S%H9370>tempest<s%> and the <S%H3851>flame<s%> of a <S%H398>consuming<s%> <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> who <S%H6633>wage<s%> <S%H6633>war<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H740>Ariel,<s%> Even <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H6633>wage<s%> <S%H6633>war<s%> against her and her <S%H9286>stronghold,<s%> and who <S%H6693>distress<s%> her, Shall be like a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> a <S%H2377>vision<s%> of the <S%H3915>night.<s%>

And it will be as <S%H9201>when<s%> a <S%H7457>hungry<s%> <S%H7457>man<s%> <S%H2492>dreams<s%> – And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he is <S%H398>eating;<s%> But when he <S%H9516>awakens,<s%> his <S%H5315>hunger<s%> is not <S%H7386>satisfied,<s%> Or as <S%H9201>when<s%> a <S%H6771>thirsty<s%> <S%H6771>man<s%> <S%H2492>dreams<s%> – And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he is <S%H8354>drinking,<s%> But when he <S%H9516>awakens,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he is <S%H5889>faint,<s%> And his <S%H5315>thirst<s%> is not <S%H8264>quenched.<s%> <S%H3651>Thus<s%> the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall be, Who <S%H6633>wage<s%> <S%H6633>war<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

Be <S%H4102>delayed<s%> and <S%H8539>wait.<s%> <S%H9619>Blind<s%> yourselves and be <S%H9619>blind.<s%> They <S%H7937>become<s%> <S%H7937>drunk,<s%> but not with <S%H3196>wine;<s%> They <S%H5128>stagger,<s%> but not with <S%H7941>strong<s%> <S%H7941>drink.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5258>poured<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H8639>deep<s%> <S%H8639>sleep,<s%> He has <S%H9429>shut<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets;<s%> And He has <S%H3680>covered<s%> your <S%H7218>heads,<s%> the <S%H2374>seers.<s%>

And the <S%H3605>entire<s%> <S%H2380>vision<s%> shall be to you like the <S%H1697>words<s%> of a <S%H2856>sealed<s%> <S%H5612>book,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> when they <S%H5414>give<s%> it to the one who is <S%H3045>literate,<s%> <S%H5612><s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H7121>read<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%>" he will <S%H559>say,<s%> "I <S%H3201>cannot,<s%> <S%H3808><s%> for it is <S%H2856>sealed.<s%>"

Then the <S%H5612>book<s%> will be <S%H5414>given<s%> to the one <S%H834>who<s%> is <S%H3808>illiterate<s%><S%H3045>,<s%> <S%H5612><s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H7121>read<s%> <S%H2088>this.<s%>" And he will <S%H559>say,<s%> "I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3045>read.<s%> <S%H5612><s%>"

Then the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3282>"Because<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5066>draw<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> with their <S%H6310>words<s%> And <S%H3513>honor<s%> Me with their <S%H8193>lip<s%> <S%H8193>service,<s%> But they <S%H7368>remove<s%> their <S%H3820>hearts<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from Me, And their <S%H3372>reverence<s%> for Me <S%H1961>consists<s%> of <S%H4687>tradition<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H3925>learned<s%> [by rote,]

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will once <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H6381>deal<s%> <S%H6381>marvelously<s%> with <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H6381>wondrously<s%> <S%H6381>marvelous;<s%> And the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of their <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>men<s%> shall perish, And the <S%H6>discernment<s%> of their <S%H998>discerning<s%> men shall be <S%H995>concealed.<s%> "

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to those who <S%H6009>deeply<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> their <S%H6098>plans<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And whose <S%H4639>deeds<s%> are [done] in a <S%H4285>dark<s%> <S%H4285>place,<s%> And they <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> <S%H7200>sees<s%> us?" or <S%H4310>"Who<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> us?"

You <S%H2016>turn<s%> [things] <S%H2016>around!<s%> Shall the <S%H3335>potter<s%> be <S%H2803>considered<s%> as equal with the <S%H2563>clay,<s%> That <S%H4639>what<s%> is <S%H4639>made<s%> should <S%H559>say<s%> to its <S%H6213>maker,<s%> "He did not <S%H6213>make<s%> me"; Or <S%H3336>what<s%> is <S%H3335>formed<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to him who <S%H3335>formed<s%> it, "He has <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H995>understanding<s%>"?

Is it not <S%H5750>yet<s%> just a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4592>while<s%> Before <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> will be <S%H7725>turned<s%> into a <S%H3759>fertile<s%> <S%H3759>field,<s%> And the <S%H3759>fertile<s%> <S%H3759>field<s%> will be <S%H2803>considered<s%> as a <S%H9194>forest<s%>?

And on that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H2795>deaf<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> of a <S%H5612>book,<s%> And out of [their] <S%H652>gloom<s%> and <S%H2822>darkness<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H5787>blind<s%> shall <S%H7200>see.<s%>

The <S%H6035>afflicted<s%> also shall <S%H3254>increase<s%> their <S%H8057>gladness<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And the <S%H34>needy<s%> of <S%H120>mankind<s%> shall <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For the <S%H6184>ruthless<s%> will <S%H656>come<s%> to an <S%H656>end,<s%> and the <S%H9238>scorner<s%> will be <S%H3615>finished,<s%> Indeed <S%H3605>all<s%> who are <S%H8245>intent<s%> on <S%H8245>doing<s%> <S%H205>evil<s%> will be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off;<s%>

Who cause a <S%H120>person<s%> to be <S%H2398>indicted<s%> by a <S%H1697>word,<s%> And <S%H6983>ensnare<s%> him who <S%H3198>adjudicates<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> And <S%H5186>defraud<s%> the <S%H6662>one<s%> in the <S%H6662>right<s%> with <S%H8414>meaningless<s%> <S%H8414>arguments.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3290>"Jacob<s%> shall not <S%H6258>now<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H2357>turn<s%> <S%H2357>pale;<s%>

But <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H7200>sees<s%> his <S%H3206>children,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of My <S%H3027>hands,<s%> in his <S%H7130>midst,<s%> They will <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> My <S%H8034>name;<s%> Indeed, they will <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> And will <S%H6206>stand<s%> in <S%H6206>awe<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
"And those who <S%H8582>err<s%> in <S%H7307>mind<s%> will <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H998>truth,<s%> And those who <S%H7279>criticize<s%> will <S%H3925>accept<s%> <S%H3948>instruction.<s%>
